plot: Set in the future, this is the story of woman who purchases a jewelry with an eye it in. Only afterwards, she encounters a boy, the former owner of the eye. A psychological story about guilt and repression.
title: Øjesten
plot_es: Set in the future, this is the story of woman who purchases a jewelry with an eye it in. Only afterwards, she encounters a boy, the former owner of the eye. A psychological story about guilt and repression.
